Linda's 65th birthday

Here are some of the pictures I have received so far. It was a wonderful party and I want to thank everybody who attended, sent messages, brought pictures, mailed cards and every other good thing you all did. Collectively, you made it a very special day. Carla deserves the "party planner of the year" award and I never knew how many of my friends and relatives were not only good secret-keepers but, also, such amazing liars!!! Good job folks. I'll never trust any of you again. (Oh, and for those of you who weren't there, I should explain that the party was held at the old Cobourg Jail, which is now an inn. That might help to explain all the iron bars. Good place for a party. They did Carla proud!) Thanks, Linda
